text: Tor Milde (14 January 1953 - 15 January 2014) was a Norwegian music journalist and writer. He was a judge on the music competition Idol in 2005 and 2006. Milde was born in Oslo. He started working in journalism in 1984. He was best known as a music journalist and critic for Verdens Gang (VG). Milde died after a short illness on the morning of 15 January 2014, aged 61, at the Ullev√•l University Hospital in his hometown of Oslo. He was survived by his two sons and his girlfriend, Irja Anthi. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Norway Category:Music critics Category:Norwegian journalists Category:Writers from Oslo
